mapper.update: UPDATE plist SET TIME=#{time},DTIME=#{dtime} WHERE ID=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT p.id ,p.uid, p.hospital, p.pdate, p.days, (p.days - (curdate() - p.pdate)) AS dday FROM plist p INNER JOIN users u ON p.uid = u.id WHERE p.uid=#{uid} AND (p.days - (curdate() - p.pdate)) > 0
